events.message: I filed a claim regarding an accident that occurred when another vehicle collided with my car at the intersection.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident due to the collision involving my vehicle on the highway.
An agent has been assigned to my claim to oversee the investigation and assist with necessary documentation.
I received confirmation that my auto accident claim has been acknowledged and is now being processed.
The insurer requested copies of the police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and the repair estimate.
I submitted all requested documents including the police report, vehicle photos, and the auto repair bill promptly.
The investigation into my car accident claim has started to verify the details and assess liability and damages.
The investigation was completed, and the report confirms the collision occurred as described in the claim.
The insurance company proposed a settlement amount to cover the damages and repairs to my vehicle.
I provided positive feedback on the timely handling and clear communication throughout the claim process.
My auto accident claim has been approved officially, and the coverage amount was confirmed.
The payment for vehicle repairs was issued and should arrive in my bank account within three business days.
The claim has been officially closed after the payment and repairs were fully completed to my satisfaction.
All claim documents and records have been archived securely for future reference if needed.
